resources.string: We will try to find device specific problem and will suggest how to solve those problem.
We couldn\â€™t connect with internet. Please check your internet connection and also internet balance.
We could not detect any problem with your device. If you still have doubts, you may contact our support.
We can see you near %s. Are you there? You can move to your near hotzones to get requests
A quick solution to fix notification or sound related problems.
Turn on GPS location and select High Accuracy mode. Also, check for internet data and turn off battery savings
We will check the stability of your current internet connection.
We will check your GPS to show your current location accurately.
We will send you a test notification and will check your notification sound.

1. Pull down the notification slider. 2. Turn on Aeroplane mode. 3. Wait for a minute. 4.Turn off Aeroplane mode. After that, 1. Press the Pathao Drive App from the notification slide for a while. 2. Go to the app settings. 3. Turn on the Priority, Sound and Vibration option.
If you are not sure about the process, please watch this short video.
Remind your friend to take a ride.
You can select your destination %d more times
You can select your destination %d more time
